title: Lost my job today
body:
The owner (my boss) sold the building right under our noses I guess, I knew something was off when we closed early today. The person that bought it I guess is revamping the building into an office complex or some shit and doesn't see the need to keep anyone around. Everyone got handed a final paycheck with a bonus, and a letter of recommendation.....
